Title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: The Band of Princes Film Kick the Future
Description: ['Music video featuring most of Prince of Tennis characters and two songs (Birthday and Rock 54) by Prince of Tennis original Seigaku\xa0voice actors. All players\xa0are presented as a band.\xa0Video itself is like a concert with some flashbacks.']
Characters: ['Echizen, Ryouma', 'Fuji, Shuusuke', 'Tezuka, Kunimitsu', 'Kikumaru, Eiji', 'Kaidou, Kaoru', 'Momoshiro, Takeshi', 'Inui, Sadaharu', 'Kawamura, Takashi', 'Oishi, Shuichiro', 'Atobe, Keigo']
Staff: [['Minagawa, Junko', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Kaida, Yuki', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Takahashi, Mikako', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Konomi, Takeshi', 'Original Creator']]
